bank

Class InactiveException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • bank.InactiveException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class InactiveException
extends Exception
    The InactiveException is thrown when a bank transaction is called on an closed account.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Dominik Gruntz
